title: It feels bad when a mobile top laner outscales/ out snowballs a Juggernaut
body:
The premise of Juggernauts is trading mobility for durability and damage. 

Some mobile top laners currently get to have their cake and eat it.

OP?  No.

As I suggested I would rather see ranged champions either able to chase or able to kite, but not be skilled at both.  In this situation Juggernauts would be strong against chasers, but still weak to kiters.

In this situation if a Juggernaut is up against a kite heavy champion in a one on one fight they would be allowed the option to disengage.  They would still have one hell of a time trying to get on top of the kiter, but they would have some amount of choice to their play.

Similarly chase heavy champions would make disengaging next to impossible for a Juggernaut, but the Juggernaut would have the option to turn around and fight.  Since Juggernauts do rather well in fights like that they would be legitimate picks against some ranged opponents.

As it is now the ranged champion has all the choice.  If they want to disengage they can, and if they want to run a Juggernaut down they can.  The Juggernaut can only respond reactively, which sucks to the point that I'd suggest something like this, which would not be an easy thing for Riot to manage.
